infos.value: Oh, princesses. How relieved I am to see you safe.
You... So you were after riches.
Hehe. Thank you so very much for your hard work.
It was all thanks to you, distracting those Rundall soldiers for us.
In other words, being taken captive was just a ruse to get to that treasure...
Bingo. So you finally get it?
How dare you!
Wh-what's the problem? If you have something to say—
You just don't seem to get it...
Huh...?
The radiance of that treasure is nothing more than a crude imitation.
What's really beautiful is the two of you.
And I'm going to help you see that.
B-Brother! At least get a little angry!
They did trick us, you know!
Hey, guys? Something's come out of the castle.
Wh-what are those cannons!?
Those are what they used to capture Lykeros Castle.
Tch! So we're dealing with siege weaponry?
Brother, we must run! There's no way we can take those on!
It’s no use. As if we'd be able to outrun them, anyway.
What...?
Those cannons... Their range must be staggering.
Besides, with that pipsqueak in tow...
B-Brother...!
Do you have some kind of death wish!?
I will not die.
For if I did, the princesses would be inconsolable.
Viktora?
Just who is that man...?
He's the absolute coolest older brother in the world!
Coolest...older brother?
...Hmm. That may be so.
I just got butterflies. That hasn't happened in quite some time.
